abstract: The ruling was a big setback to Wal-Mart’s efforts to block the nation’s largest sex discrimination lawsuit.
snippet: The ruling was a big setback to Wal-Mart’s efforts to block the nation’s largest sex discrimination lawsuit.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart’s efforts to block the nation’s largest sex discrimination lawsuit suffered a big setback yesterday when a federal appeals court in San Francisco ruled that the case should proceed as a class action.

headline.main: Court Approves Class-Action Suit Against Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Court Approves Class-Action Suit Against Wal-Mart
